org.contentmine.graphics.svg.util

Class SuperPixelArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.util.SuperPixelArray

  • public class SuperPixelArray
extends java.lang.Object
    a rectangular array of integer squares representing graphic components will later have a variable step size representing different granularities (min size =1) allows for offset origin currently crude and uses whole page from (0,0) with int=1 steps each pixel can hold a non-negative integer (usually a count).
    Author:
    pm286
